thread.section_title: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc | www.townfairtire.com | 12 of 1307
thread.title: Linda
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Linda

author: Linda
title: Linda
text:
This is not my first time buying tires from this location of Town Fair Tire. The service here is great; the staff is very efficient and knowledgeable. My car was ready in less than an hour.
Mike, the service manager is very personable and remembers his customers when they return. I highly recommend this location.
